City Council
============

Regular Meetings
----------------

* 6:00 p.m.
* The 4th Tuesday of every month
* City Hall Council Chambers  
  1025 Campbell Road  
  Houston, Texas 77055

Next Scheduled Council Meeting: January 27
------------------------------------------

[Join our Council Meeting](https://us02web.zoom.us/j/8672676387646)

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Meeting agendas/notices are posted as soon as they become available. Council meeting minutes are posted after approval by City Council at the regular Council meetings.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://springvalleytx.portal.civicclerk.com/)

Contact Information
-------------------

Contact any of the following using the [City Council email address](mailto: city.council@springvalleytx.com):

* Mayor
* All Council Members
* City Administrator

### Contact Us

1. ### Physical Address:

   1025 Campbell Road  
   Houston, TX 77055

   ### City Hall Business Hours:

   **Monday through Thursday -**7:30 AM to 4:30 PM  
   **Friday -**7:30 AM to 2:00 PM  
   **Closed Daily** - 12:00 PM to 1:00 PM

   ### **City Hall Phone Number:** (713) 465-8308

   ### Police Department Business Hours

   24 hours a day, 7 days a week

   ### Police Department Non-Emergency Phone Number

   (713) 465-8323
